General.Name: Alphaville S.A
General.Description: Alphaville S.A. engages in residential subdivision activity under the Alphaville brand in Brazil. The company was formerly known as Private Equity AE Investimentos e Participações S.A. Alphaville S.A. was founded in 1973 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. das Nações Unidas, 14.171, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04794-000

1.Name: Mr. Marco Nicola D'Ippolito
1.Title: Vice Chairman of the Management Board
